dr.inference.model
Class DummyLikelihood

java.lang.Object
  dr.inference.model.Likelihood.Abstract
      dr.inference.model.DummyLikelihood
All Implemented Interfaces:
Loggable, Likelihood, ModelListener, Identifiable, java.io.Serializable
public class DummyLikelihood
extends Likelihood.Abstract

A class that always returns a log likelihood of 0 but contains models that would otherwise be unregistered with the MCMC. This is an ugly solution to a rare problem.

Version:
$Id: DummyLikelihood.java,v 1.3 2005/05/24 20:26:00 rambaut Exp $
Author:
Andrew Rambaut

Returns:

calculateLogLikelihood

public double calculateLogLikelihood()
Calculate the log likelihood of the current state. If all the statistics are true then it returns 0.0 otherwise -INF.

Specified by:
calculateLogLikelihood in class Likelihood.Abstract
Returns:
the log likelihood.
